title: Why does this always happen?
body: When i'm not on my promos I get a really really good team and when I am on my promos I literally get a team that feeds the whole game, like i've been in bronze 1 promos to silver v and my 2nd - 3rd game I always get a feeding team. I went jungle last 2 games and botlane feeds and blames me. It's just so annoying cause i'm trying my best to win this game and botlane just goes on blaming me and saying "Well if you are so worried come gank us" I gank them and guess what happens.......they help me after I die..... when I pinged so much that i was going in. Late game is where everything just got f**ked. Instead of the support sticking with the adc to protect her while she farms, the support roams all the way top and the adc pushes without any ward and so. How do I win promos?

replies.body: Haha, this happened on me so many times as well. I went 12-2-19 as Lee in my promotion game just now and my team still lost. i swear i did everthing i could out there but our ad carry was just stupid.
hahahhha I thought I was the only one

Yeah, it's weird. I just try to play during the times school kids won't be on the most  and team up with friends that are good. Maybe it's something in the  system? e.g  players in promos are put with other players in promos???? I don't know, I just sort of quit rank and play aram the most really. I've already gotten gold 5 and silver twice on na then played on and off 7 times over 5  years and switching to oce. You can vs challengers rarely in aram, plats aren't hard to find sometimes. I'm not sure if the aram ranking counts much because I get paired up with plats vs bronze but then my plat allies play like bronzes. LOL, So I always go tanky, even making a tank Vayne if my team's fed too much for me to go damage build so I can deter dives whenever were dive-able under the turrets.

But if you put with players that were also in promos, wouldn't you have a better chance if winning?

P.S. I had a Master and 2 Diamonds in a normal game, and I will say now, they either bought an account or got boosted REALLY high ;D
hahaah. I went against a master mid swain and holy fk the dude just goes in on a 1 v 4 and gets a quadra hahaha. You can tell if they are boosted or not.
I just wanna get gold for the border and the championship skin.

Yeah me too, I miss my gold icon trim during load screen. Gold trim profile picture, not the gold border. It feels weird how they clear rank wins now if you don't play for a long time. Mine use to have like 270 rank wins or something then they started clearing??? Oh and it's sort of annoying how rank use to only have like 5 ranks now they've added platinum and master lol.
Apparently the rank resets after every season.

This is why players give up on ranked. You cannot expect to win enough games and than win some more when you hit the promos.

You win enough to get there, than because you won a few games it matches you backwards and you can't really win.
Well, I finally hit silver 5 but god damn I had to play like it was my last game ever and went all out. Got all my lanes fed asf :D

Has any  body else noticed players that keep retreating full hp or with a lot of hp without even using auto attack or when they aren't even being targeted??? Like those  feeders who are silent all game but at the end, inside the results lobby they start mocking the whole team???
